oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Col. Anthony Wylie served May 1969 to May 1970 in Vietnam, where he flew 230 missions piloting the Air Forceâ€™s Sky Raider, which was a search-and-rescue aircraft. This interview was conducted Sept. 1, 2020, by Billy Minser.
